description: This file demonstrates asynchronous and synchronous execution of tasks using an Agent with OpenAIChat model, including logging and task simulation functions.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an AI agent configured with a model and tools, capable of executing tasks asynchronously or synchronously.

classes.name: OpenAIChat
classes.description: Represents an OpenAI chat model configuration used by the Agent.

methods.name: atask1
methods.description: Asynchronous function that simulates a task with a delay, logging progress.

methods.name: atask2
methods.description: Asynchronous function that simulates a task with a delay, logging progress.

methods.name: atask3
methods.description: Asynchronous function that simulates a task with a delay, logging progress.

methods.name: task1
methods.description: Synchronous function that simulates a task with a delay, logging progress.

methods.name: task2
methods.description: Synchronous function that simulates a task with a delay, logging progress.

methods.name: task3
methods.description: Synchronous function that simulates a task with a delay, logging progress.
